Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates

Class TurnState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP43.server.controller.gameStates.TurnState
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildState, ChooseCardState, ChooseWorkerState, MoveState, PlayerRegistrationState, WinState
public abstract class TurnState
extends java.lang.Object
This is an abstract class to represent a general structure of turns of a game.

    static class  TurnState.TurnName
    This enum represents the names of turn types of the game.

    • checkForWinner

      public boolean checkForWinner​(AbstractGodCard card, GameSession gameSession)
      This method checks if a player has won the match.
      Parameters:
      card - The card that is used to check if the player has won the game.
      gameSession - This is a reference to the main access to the game database.
      Returns:
      True if the player has won the game, false otherwise.
